name: GCMouse
desc: An object that represents a physical mouse connected to a device.

items.name: class func mice() -> [GCMouse]
items.desc: Returns any mice that the user connects to the device.

items.name: static let GCMouseDidConnect: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that posts after a mouse connects to the device.

items.name: static let GCMouseDidDisconnect: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that posts after a mouse disconnects from the device.

items.name: class var current: GCMouse?
items.desc: The most recent mouse that the user connects.

items.name: static let GCMouseDidBecomeCurrent: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that posts when a mouse becomes the most recent mouse that the user connects.

items.name: static let GCMouseDidStopBeingCurrent: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that posts when a mouse stops being the most recent mouse that the user connects.

items.name: var mouseInput: GCMouseInput?
items.desc: The controller profile for the mouse device.
